name: Bob's Dream
description:
This game has been posted on two different game jams, The Bad Game Jam and the LSDJam 2022.

If you came from the LSDJam 2022, read this part below.

You play as Bob is stuck inside a confusing mess full of bricks, rocks, pillars, and glass shards. Can you get Bob out of this nightmare?

If you came from The Bad Game Jame, read this part below.

I was in a rush ;). I placed all of the tiles in perfect alignment with the stars and moon. If you wondering why it's all red, it's because the top of the editor that I was using was red (Your welcome.) Hint: Find the misplaced rock ;) GL LOL.
